ygData.subject: Moderating is a tough job...
ygData.msgSnippet: Sometimes being a UberSemiNaziDictator is a tough job.  I m only human, I make mistakes, as we all do.  As I so rapidly recanted my warning to Harmonic, so do
ygData.messageBody:
Sometimes being a UberSemiNaziDictator is a tough job. I'm only human, I
make mistakes, as we all do. As I so rapidly recanted my warning to
Harmonic, so do I now recant one of my two warnings to Steelwolf, aka
Ariell Thunderwolff. I am not perfect, and I'm afraid that I leapt to the
wrong conclusion when I saw the method that the message had been
posted. Ariell apparently made a mistake in his transmission - he intended
to send a quoted version, not to make it look like Harmonic had sent it.
So, with that in mind, I do apologize to Ariell.
Unfortunately, Ariell chose (of his own volition) to unsubscribe earlier
today, so I am CC'ing this message to him. If you wish to say anything to
him, or protest his choice, please feel free to email him directly.

In spite of this, I do still stand by my original decision. Posting
private email to this list is bad form. Doing it as a method of flaming or
to provoke someone else into flaming back is not allowed. Period. We're
all adults here, and this is an open, public forum. There is no need to
play "He said she said!!!"

Let's all learn to get along, and get back to talking about cool Bard stuff.

Talies the Wanderer
